title: tiruppEr nagaril
sahitya:
tiruppEr nagaril tiruvALan tiruppEr olikkudammA engum iruppOr manattai izhukkudammA


caraNam 1    shiruttAn indiran shApattinAl dinam uraittAn sundarat-tirunAmam 
nilaittAn neDunAL peruvAzhvil anda malat-tAL ninaindE pOTriDammA
    caraNam 2    kaLippuru sukhamE kiDaittiDavE nI sezhippuruvayal shUzh shenkaN aNNalai
vizhippuDan tudittiDammA enrum pozhippuDan vAzhndiDammA engaL
    caraNam 3    paDuttAn pAmbil pAngODu appak-kuDattAn enrE kuvalayattil
eDuttAn tiruppEr emmiraivan tammai uLattAl EttiyE UindiDammA
